name: Natural Baby Laundry Detergent
description:
Specially formulated with fruit-based cleaning agents, our laundry detergent is safe for your babyâ€™s clothes and gentle enough for anyone with sensitive skin or allergies. It removes odors and cleans without leaving toxic residue. Multi-fruit enzymes wash away the toughest stains, while rice bran oil softens clothes without the use of chemicals. Naturally scented with essential oils, our detergent leaves clothes smelling fresh and clean.

With multi-fruit enzymes,
rice bran oil, olive oil, spearmint oil, clove oil & kefir lime oil


Ingredients

Aqua, multi-fruit enzymes, lauryl glucoside, decyl glucoside, glycerin, tocopheryl acetate, acrylates copolymer, oryza sativa (rice bran oil), olive oil PEG-7 esters, mentha viridis (spearmint oil), citrus aurantium dulcis (orange oil), eugenia caryophyllus (clove oil), citrus hystrix (kaffir lime oil), phenoxyethanol, potassium sorbate.

name: Natural Baby Bottle & Dish Cleanser
description:
Our baby bottle and dish cleanser is made from a unique blend of fruit and plant-based cleaning agents with a touch of essential oil. Tropical multi-fruit enzymes help dissolve milk residue and food stains effectively without the use of harsh chemicals. Naturally scented with kefir lime, lavender, and citrus to eliminate odor, our cleanser is gentle on the skin, but strong enough for the toughest stains. No fragrances are added. Perfect for all your baby accessories: bottles, dishes, utensils, toys, breast pump, and more.

With multi-fruit enzymes,
rice bran oil, citrus oil, kaffir lime oil & lavender oil.


Ingredients

Aqua, multi-fruit enzymes, lauryl glucoside, decyl glucoside, sodium methyl2-sulfolaurate, disodium 2-sulfolaurate, PEG-90 glyceryl isostearate (and) laureth-2, oryza sativa (rice bran oil), dl-alpha tocopherol, citurs hysterix (kaffir lime oil), citrus aurantifolia (citrus oil), lavandular angustifolia (lavender oil), sodium benzoate, potassium sorbate.


Benefits
Rice Bran Oil

Our oil is made from quality Thai rice. High in antioxidant and known for its softening properties, it's excellent for anyone with sensitive or dry skin.


Kaffir Lime Oil and Citrus Oil

As natural deodorizers, citrus and kaffir lime helps dissolve greasy residue, leaving only a fresh, clean scent.


Lavender Oil

Lavender oil is known for its antiseptic and antifungal properties. It also has a calming scent.

name: Natural Baby Shampoo & Body Wash
description:
Our natural baby shampoo & bodywash is formulated with fruit and plant-based cleaning agents infused with rice bran oil, olive oil, and coconut oil to gently clean without harmful chemicals. It effectively washes away dirt and grease from head to toe with multi-fruit enzymes, while protecting and nourishing the skin, using vitamins from natural oils. Rice bran oil helps prevents dryness and preserves moisture, leaving skin soft and hair smooth and manageable after every wash.

With multi-fruit enzymes,
rice bran oil, coconut oil, olive oil, lavender oil & neroli oil.


Ingredients

Aqua, multi-fruit enzymes, lauryl glucoside, decyl glucoside, sodium coco-glucoside tartrate, acrylates copolymer, aloe barbadensis leaf extract, glycerin, oryza sativa (rice bran oil), cocos nucifera (coconut oil), olive oil PEG-7 esters, citrus aurantium (neroli oil), lavandula angustifolia (lavender oil), sodium benzoate, potassium sorbate.


Benefits
Rice Bran Oil

Our oil is made from quality Thai rice. High in antioxidant and known for its softening properties, it's excellent for anyone with sensitive or dry skin.


Olive Oil

One of the best oils for delicate skin. It helps keeps skin soft and smooth.


Coconut Oil

Its moisturizing and anti-inflammatory properties make coconut oil a popular ingredient in many personal care products. When added to shampoo or soap, it acts as a replacement for natural oils lost in the hair and the skin through regular washing.


Lavender and Neroli Oil

Both oils contain relaxing and soothing properties. Perfect for calming down the baby before bedtime.

name: Natural Multi-Purpose Cleaner Liquid Concentrate With Fruit Enzyme
description: Use Rain Natural Multi-Purpose Cleaner to clean multiple surfaces in bathroom and kitchen without leaving toxic residue. Our cleaner helps prevent mold and remove odor. Use it to polish surfaces to restore their original shine. Perfect for cleaning oven, range tops, stainless steel, furniture, bathroom, car, and other household surfaces. And because rain is highly concentrated, a little goes a long way to help keep your house clean. Mix a capful of our solution with a gallon of water for general use. With natural cleaning power from pineapple, lime, citrus, and essential oil.

name: Natual Dog Shampoo With Fruit Enzyme
description: Specially formulated with fruit-based cleaning agents, Rain Natural Dog Shampoo cleans without leaving toxic residue or causing irritation. It helps deodorize and keep out fleas and ticks. Our shampoo promotes stronger hair follicles, prevents hair loss, and will leaves the coat soft, plush and tangle-free. There is no harmful chemicals or artificial fragrances, only natural scent from essential oil. Select from citrus or lavender lemongrass. This product is best for dogs and puppies with short hair. With natural cleaning power from lime, mangosteen shell and citrus.

name: Natural Laundry Detergent Liquid Concentrate With Fruit Enzyme
description: Specially formulated with fruit-based cleaning agents, Rain Natural Laundry Detergent cleans without leaving toxic residue. Our detergent is hypoallergenic, safe on color fabrics, and gentle on skin. It's perfect for anyone with allergies or sensitive skin. It even works well on baby clothes. The fruit enzyme helps remove odor without harmful chemicals. Use it for both hand-wash and machine-wash. And because Rain is highly concentrated, a little goes a long way. Three capfuls are enough to wash a normal load. Use 2 capfuls for high efficiency washers. Wash up to 45 loads per bottle. With natural cleaning power from pineapple, lime, citrus, and essential oil.

name: Natural Multi-Purpose Cleaner Liquid Concentrate Small
description: Use Rain Natural Multi-Purpose Cleaner to clean multiple surfaces in bathroom and kitchen without leaving toxic residue. Our cleaner helps prevent mold and remove odor. Use it to polish surfaces to restore their original shine. Perfect for cleaning oven, range tops, stainless steel, furniture, bathroom, car, and other household surfaces. And because rain is highly concentrated, a little goes a long way to help keep your house clean. Mix a capful of our solution with a gallon of water for general use. With natural cleaning power from pineapple, lime, citrus, and essential oil.
